Verses: 1 isravel Egipthilum, Yaakkobin Kudumbam Anniya Baashaikkaararaana Janaththilumirundhu Purappattabodhu,
2 yoodhaa Avarukku Parisuththa Sthaanamum, Isravel Avarukku Raajyamumaayitru.
3 kadal Kandu Vilagi Oditru; Yordhaan Pinnittu Thirumbinadhu.
5 kadale, Nee Vilagiyodugiradharkum; Yordhaane, Nee Pinnittu Thirumbugiradharkum;
6 malaigale, Neengal Aattukkadaakkalaippolavum; Kundrugale, Neengal Aattukkuttigalaippolavum Thullugiradharkum, Ungalukku Enna Vandhadhu?
7 boomiye, Nee Aandavarukku Munbaagavum, Yaakkobudaiya Dhevanukku Munbaagavum Adhiru.
8 avar Kanmalaiyai Thanneerththadaagamaagavum, Karpaaraiyai Neerootrugalaagavum Maatrugiraar.
